articles.description: Latest football news as Gareth Southgate is set to name his initial England squad for Euro 2024 - follow build-up and a live Q&A with chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Build-up as Southgate set to name initial England squad for Euro 2024

articles.description: Crystal Palace's Eberechi Eze, Marc Guehi, Dean Henderson and Adam Wharton will be named in Gareth Southgate's provisional squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: Eberechi Eze, Marc Guehi, Dean Henderson and Adam Wharton in provisional England Euro 2024 squad

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says it was a 'difficult decision" to omit Jordan Henderson from his provisional 33-man England squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: England Euro 2024 squad: 'Really difficult' to leave Jordan Henderson out - Gareth Southgate

articles.description: Real Madrid and Germany midfielder Toni Kroos is set to retire from professional football after Euro 2024.
articles.title: Toni Kroos: Real Madrid and Germany midfielder to retire from professional football after Euro 2024

articles.description: BBC Sport's F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions before this weekend's Monaco Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A before Monaco: McLaren, Norris, Newey, Perez, Ricciardo, Aston Martin

articles.description: Anthony Edwards has been such a standout for Minnesota Timberwolves that he is drawing comparisons with NBA legend Michael Jordan. BBC Sport looks at a rising star.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Is Anthony Edwards really the next Michael Jordan?

articles.description: Burnley boss Vincent Kompany is a surprise name on Bayern Munich’s list of potential candidates to become their new coach.
articles.title: Vincent Kompany: Bayern Munich include Burnley boss on list for potential new coach

articles.description: Captain Jos Buttler says England's "pride was dented" by their disappointing defence of the 50-over World Cup last year.
articles.title: England v Pakistan: Hosts return with "pride dented" says Jos Buttler

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is set to play in his 11th major international tournament as he is named in Portugal's squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Portugal name Cristiano Ronaldo in squad

articles.description: Australia’s Ben O'Connor calls the race organisers “dinosaurs” after a delayed and chaotic start to a shortened stage 16 of the Giro d’Italia, which is eventually won by race leader Tadej Pogacar.
articles.title: Pogacar wins chaotic stage as organisers are called 'dinosaurs'
